item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Parents are like God because you wanna know they're out there, and you want them to think well of you, but you really only call when you need something." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Today is the sort of day where the sun only comes up to humiliate you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When did the future switch from being a promise to being a threat?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "By the time you read this, you'll be older than you remember." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All you can do is hope for a pattern to emerge, and sometimes it never does. Still, with a plan, you only get the best you can imagine. I'd always hoped for something better than that." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I want out of the labels. I don't want my whole life crammed into a single word. A story. I want to find something else, unknowable, some place to be that's not on the map. A real adventure.' A spinx. A mystery. A blank. Unknown. Undefined." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "For thousands of years, human beings had screwed up and trashed and crapped on this planet, and now history expected me to clean up after everyone. I have to wash out and flatten my soup cans. And account for every drop of used motor oil. And I have to foot the bill for nuclear waste and buried gasoline tanks and landfilled toxic sludge dumped a generation before I was born." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The unreal is more powerful than the real. Because nothing is as perfect as you can imagine it. Because its only intangible ideas, concepts, beliefs, fantasies that last. Stone crumbles. Wood rots. People, well, they die. But things as fragile as a thought, a dream, a legend, they can go on and on. If you can change the way people think. The way they see themselves. The way they see the world. You can change the way people live their lives. That's the only lasting thing you can create." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "For years now, I've wanted to fall asleep. The sort of slipping off, the giving up, the falling part of sleep. Now sleeping is the last thing I want to do." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hailey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk
